name: bamtools

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

variants.name: generator
variants.description: the build system generator to use

description: C++ API & command-line toolkit for working with BAM data.

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: ninja
dependencies.description:
Ninja is a small build system with a focus on speed. It differs from
other build systems in two major respects: it is designed to have its
input files generated by a higher-level build system, and it is designed
to run builds as fast as possible.

dependencies.name: zlib
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.

dependencies.name: jsoncpp
dependencies.description:
JsonCpp is a C++ library that allows manipulating JSON values, including
serialization and deserialization to and from strings. It can also
preserve existing comment in unserialization/serialization steps, making
it a convenient format to store user input files.

dependent_to.name: express
dependent_to.description:
eXpress is a streaming tool for quantifying the abundances of a set of
target sequences from sampled subsequences.

dependent_to.name: augustus
dependent_to.description:
AUGUSTUS is a program that predicts genes in eukaryotic genomic
sequences

dependent_to.name: braker
dependent_to.description:
BRAKER is a pipeline for unsupervised RNA-Seq-based genome annotation
that combines the advantages of GeneMark-ET and AUGUSTUS

dependent_to.name: ea-utils
dependent_to.description:
Command-line tools for processing biological sequencing data. Barcode
demultiplexing, adapter trimming, etc. Primarily written to support an
Illumina based pipeline - but should work with any FASTQs.

dependent_to.name: sga
dependent_to.description:
SGA is a de novo genome assembler based on the concept of string graphs.
The major goal of SGA is to be very memory efficient, which is achieved
by using a compressed representation of DNA sequence reads.

dependent_to.name: sniffles
dependent_to.description: Structural variation caller using third generation sequencing.

dependent_to.name: bamaddrg
dependent_to.description:
bamaddrg adds read groups to input BAM files, streams BAM output on
stdout
